alert.note: Alert for Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 2:21PM CDT until August 29 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kimberling City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Branson... Table Rock Lake... Silver Dollar City... Kimberling City... Merriam Woods... Reeds Spring... Bull Creek... Indian Point... Branson West... Galena... Coney Island... Cape Fair... Walnut Shade... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
